channel.title: Unkown Command "java"
channel.description:
Hello.
Can someone help me? When i start my server (Allstar Scape), it always says
[code]The Command "java" is typed wrong..[/code] (something like that)
I dont know how to fix it... :(
This is my runserver.bat:
[code]@echo off color 0a title ####-Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
I got the latest JDK (JDK 6 Update 12).. So PLEASE help me :D
mfG

item.title: Unkown Command "java"
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

Ehm… i dont know what you wanna say me with it…

BUT THANK YOU!

I forgot to make that with PATH etc. >_< (im so noob :D)

[size=10pt]Thanks again![/size]
